intro: Eschweilera obversa, commonly known as the pink miconia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Melastomataceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil, Colombia, and Ecuador. The plant is characterized by its broad, heart-shaped leaves and clusters of pink or purple flowers.
